name: Zlirfy Car Touch Up Paint Pen - Automotive Paint Repair, Quick & Easy Scratch Removal, Clear Painting Pen for Cars (White)
short_description: [Brush Head Design] Our car scratch remover is necessary for car lovers and drivers. The soft brush head design makes the repair of car paint scratches more accurate and easy, waterproof, portable, and very practical. There are two colors to choose from: black and white.

[Save Time and Effort] Our car repair paint can quickly repair the unpainted or peeled areas. Minor car scratches can cause serious damage. It will not only make your car look ugly, but also expose the metal under the paint to the air, thus rusting. The car scratch remover is integrated with the original car paint and has no color difference in natural light, making the car look like new. It will save you a lot of money to repair small scratches.

[Method of Use] First shake the product thoroughly to make the paint fully mixed, and then wipe the scratches clean. Rust and unevenness should be smoothed. Do not apply it back and forth. The order can be from left to right, or from top to bottom. It can be applied again after half an hour. In general, 3-5 layers of coating are sufficient for deep scratches.

[Widely Applicable] For car enthusiasts and drivers, it is necessary to repair minor scratches and save a lot of time and money. It is the best choice for personal repair of car paint scratches. It is applicable to plastic roofs, doors, engine covers and even bumpers; Metal, glass fiber and PVC.

[Note] This pen cannot make the scratches disappear 100%, it can only make the scratches invisible and prevent the body from rusting. If you have high requirements for scratch repair, you'd better go to the car repair shop for help.
